description: This file defines a React component for rendering a Resources page in a web application. It includes functionality for filtering, pagination, and bulk uploading of resources, utilizing various imported components and types. It handles fetching resource data from an API and displays it in a table with associated controls.

methods.name: Resources
methods.description: Main React functional component that renders the resources page, with filters, table, pagination, and bulk upload features.

methods.name: formatCurrency
methods.description: Utility function to format a number as USD currency string.
